package.name: @choice-ui/form
package.description: Form components for Choiceform Design System

props.description:
增强版的 useForm hook
在 TanStack Form 的基础上添加适配器组件
Checkbox 适配器 - 将 Checkbox 组件适配到 Form 系统
Input 适配器 - 将 Input 组件适配到 Form 系统

RadioGroup 适配器 - 将 RadioGroup 组件适配到 Form 系统

核心功能：
1. 值绑定
2. 事件处理
3. 错误状态显示
4. 样式适配

props.name: options
props.type: { disabled?: boolean | undefined; label: string; value: string; }[] | undefined

props.description: Select 适配器 - 将 Select 组件适配到 Form 系统
Textarea 适配器 - 将 Textarea 组件适配到 Form 系统

props.name: allowNewline
props.description: Whether to allow newline characters when pressing Enter. Default is true

props.name: lineHeight
props.description: Line height in pixels for calculating textarea height. Default is 16

props.name: padding
props.description: Padding in pixels (top/bottom) for calculating textarea height. Default is 4 (py-1)
Switch 适配器 - 将 Switch 组件适配到 Form 系统

Switch 适配器 - 将 Switch 组件适配到 Form 系统

核心功能：
1. 值绑定
2. 事件处理
3. 错误状态显示
4. 样式适配

props.name: connectsClassName
props.type: { negative?: string | undefined; positive?: string | undefined; } | undefined

props.name: trackSize
props.type: { height?: number | undefined; width?: number | "auto" | undefined; } | undefined

props.description: NumericInput 适配器 - 将 NumericInput 组件适配到 Form 系统

props.name: classNames
props.type: { container?: string | undefined; input?: string | undefined; } | undefined

props.description: MultiSelect 适配器 - 将 MultiSelect 组件适配到 Form 系统

props.name: i18n
props.type: { maxSelectionMessage?: ((maxSelection: number) => string) | undefined; minSelectionMessage?: ((minSelection: number) => string) | undefined; } | undefined

props.name: renderChip
props.type: ((props: { disabled?: boolean | undefined; displayValue: string; index: number; onRemove?: ((e: MouseEvent<HTMLButtonElement, MouseEvent>) => void) | undefined; value: string; }) => ReactNode) | undefined

props.description:
Segmented 适配器 - 将 Segmented 组件适配到 Form 系统

核心功能：
1. 值绑定
2. 事件处理
3. 错误状态显示
4. 样式适配

stories.name: Input
stories.description:
When is validation performed?
It's up to you! The <Field /> component accepts some callbacks as props such as onChange or onBlur.
Those callbacks are passed the current value of the field, as well as the fieldAPI object, so that you can perform the validation.
If you find a validation error, simply return the error message as string and it will be available in field.state.meta.errors.
